roleset.name: force to go away

example.name: transitive
example.text: At a meeting with analysts , British Petroleum officials dispelled speculation that the company may take over a U.S. oil company , according to Dow Jones Professional Investor Report .
example.arg: speculation that the company may take over a U.S. oil company

roleset.note: DISPEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dispel' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dispel.01-v predicate notes)
